mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (nick_name, email, password, avatar, phone, openid, bio, level, points, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{nickName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{phone}, #{openid}, #{bio}, #{level}, #{points}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nick_name = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, avatar = #{avatar}, phone = #{phone}, openid = #{openid}, bio = #{bio}, level = #{level}, points = #{points}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
